## Commands expected to produce errors (useful when you want to test failure cases)
add type="x"
add name="A" extra="x"
add name="A" due="2025-10-31"
add name="A" rep="YEARLY"
add name="A" prio="URGENT"
print sort_by=name direction=up
print sort_by=unknown
list property="type"
list property="type" val="School extra=1"
mod id=0 property="desc"
mod id=100 property="desc" new_val="x"
mod id=0 property="unknown" new_val="x"
mod id=0 property="due" new_val="2025/10/31"
done
done id=999

foobar arg=1
add name=12345
